Welcome to Grey Shield Research

We specialize in analyzing post-arrest research data. Whether you are a criminal justice agency, an advocacy group, a university, or another entity that needs data analyzed we are here to provide data driven, evidence based solutions for your criminal justice needs. Our staff includes a former Correctional Officer, Ivy League alumni (University of Pennsylvania), and a research scientist at an R1 University (and that is just our founder!).

We are here to research the issues in criminal justice that effect your agency. We have experience analyzing issues ranging from gang management, to Pre-trial assessment, to PREA.
